text: Ezɨ Ahimelek kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Bar puvatɨ. Devit a nɨn ingangarir gumazibar faragha zuir gumazir bar aghuim, egha a deraghavɨra nɨn gɨrara zui. Ingangarir gumazitam a gafirazir puvatɨ. A uaghan nɨn amerem, a nɨn boroghɨn ikia nɨ geghuvir mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanir mam. Nɨn dɨpenimɨn aven itir adarasi, me bar a gifuegha ziar ekiam a ganɨdi.22:14 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
